treatment-md.title: Thulinius augusti Bertolani, Bartels, Guidetti, Cesari & Nelson, 2014, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Aquatic tardigrades in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, North Carolina and Tennessee, U. S. A., with the description of a new species of Thulinius (Tardigrada, Isohypsibiidae)
